wikipedia_page.main: Air Marshal Sir David Allan Walker,  (born 14 July 1956) is a Director at Alexander Mann Solutions, and a member of the Advisory Board of Auticon. He is a retired senior Royal Air Force officer and Master of the Household to the Sovereign.

link_mentions.page: List of Knights and Dames Commander of the Royal Victorian Order appointed by Elizabeth II (since 2003)
